subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Reinfried Herbst of Austria made it two wins in two World Cup slalom races this season with a victory Monday on the Gran Risa course in Alta Badia, Italy.
snippet: Reinfried Herbst of Austria made it two wins in two World Cup slalom races this season with a victory Monday on the Gran Risa course in Alta Badia, Italy.
